long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Format your LinkedIn™ Text and Posts with The Blabigo Text Formatter.


Elevate your LinkedIn™ presence with Blabigo, the secure platform crafted for creators. Craft and analyze your content effortlessly, maximizing your impact in moments.

🔍 Explore posts across various devices effortlessly.
📝 Craft compelling text with bold and italic options, bullets, emojis, and more.
👁‍ Ensure your content is easily scannable with our readability score.
🗒️ Seamlessly switch between drafts, jot down notes, or schedule posts for later.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Collaborate on drafts with teammates or clients for valuable feedback and joint creation.
📅 Effortlessly manage your posting schedule with our convenient calendar view.
🏷 Access over 100 hooks and CTA endings templates .
📚 Gather insights on all your LinkedIn™ posts and their performance metrics.
🔬 Dive deep into post metrics and compare performance with ease.
📊 Analyze content analytics for individuals and teams.
👥 Manage unlimited company pages and groups with a single profile 
🎉 Perfect for individuals, teams, and marketing agencies alike.

Unlike other LinkedIn™ tools, we don't compromise on your security or automate any activities. Your account's safety is our top priority.

Using the Blabigo extension doesn't require creating a separate account. However, you can sign up anytime for access to advanced features with our free trial.

Explore our plans and get started for FREE today: https://blabigo.com/pricing

👔 Operations and Compliance:

✔ Blabigo is not affiliated with LinkedIn™ Corporation.
✔ We do not access any private data such as passwords, emails, or browsing history.
✔ Blabigo is fully compliant with GDPR regulations.
✔ All data is securely hosted in Germany.

Disclaimer: Blabigo is provided as a third-party application and is not endorsed by LinkedIn™. Blabigo does not scrape or automate user behaviour.
